raw: Francis Kennedy, War Hero and Restless Inventor, Dies at 95 .
replaced: John and Robert Kennedy Dies at 95 .

raw: This obituary is part of a series about people who have died in the coronavirus pandemic .
replaced: This obituary is part of a series about people who have died in the coronavirus pandemic .

raw: From time to time over the decades , Francis A. Kennedy would rub a patch of stubble on his face and then find a tiny wooden splinter in his palm .
replaced: From time to time over the decades , Frank would rub a patch of stubble on Frank face and then find a tiny wooden splinter in Frank palm .

raw: On Sept. 25 , 1951 , Mr. Kennedy , a 27 - year - old officer serving as a forward artillery observer , was on patrol on the Korean Peninsula when his unit was ambushed by Chinese soldiers .
replaced: On Sept. 25 , 1951 , Frank , was on patrol on the Korean Peninsula when Frank unit was ambushed by Chinese soldiers .

raw: They quickly picked off three of his men .
replaced: Chinese soldiers quickly picked off all three  Frank men .

raw: Mr. Kennedy , his Rosary prayers mingling with the whine of bullets , pulled all three to safety , but not before an enemy round smashed into a tree nearby , embedding fragments of it into his face and body .
replaced: Frank , Frank Rosary prayers mingling with the whine of bullets , pulled all three to safety , but not before an enemy round smashed into a tree nearby , embedding fragments of a tree into Frank face and body .

raw: For his heroism , Mr. Kennedy won the Silver Star ; for his wounds , the first of two Purple Hearts .
replaced: For Frank heroism , Frank won the Silver Star ; for Frank wounds , the first of two Purple Hearts .

raw: And for the rest of his life he bore the splinters , which would rise , unpredictably , out of his skin like memories .
replaced: And for the rest of Frank life Frank bore the splinters , which would rise , unpredictably , out of Frank skin like memories .

raw: His children — 10 boys and three girls raised in a house near Buffalo with a single bathroom — remembered him as a puckish storyteller and a restlessly creative inventor huddled over his work at a tarp - draped pool table in their garage .
replaced: Frank  their — remembered Frank as a puckish storyteller and a restlessly creative inventor huddled over a restlessly creative inventor work at the table  their garage .

raw: He came close to hitting it big in the 1970s , when he invented an early form of caller - ID .
replaced: Frank came close to hitting it big in the 1970s , when Frank invented an early form of caller - ID .

raw: He had more success a few years later designing an energy - efficient concrete block .
replaced: Frank had more success a few years later designing an energy - efficient concrete block .

raw: Early on , he tended bar , worked in a steel mill and sold liquor wholesale to put food on the table .
replaced: Early on , Frank tended bar , worked in a steel mill and sold liquor wholesale to put food on the table .

raw: He adored John and Robert Kennedy , thought ( though never proved ) that he and the more famous Kennedy family were relatives , and even bought Lady Bird Johnson ’s former limousine as a gift to his wife , whose name was Jacqueline Kennedy and , yes , known as Jackie .
replaced: Frank adored John and Robert Kennedy , thought ( though never proved ) that Frank and the more famous Kennedy family were relatives , and even bought Lady Bird Johnson ’s former limousine as a gift to Frank  his mother .

raw: Mr. Kennedy was born on June 21 , 1924 , in Pittston , Pa. , to Francis P. and Loretta Kennedy .
replaced: Frank was born on June 21 , 1924 , in Pittston , Pa. , to Francis P. and Loretta Kennedy .

raw: Frank was 16 when he ran away from home in 1942 to enlist during wartime but was sent back after his mother had demanded it .
replaced: Frank was 16 when Frank ran away from home in 1942 to enlist during wartime but was sent back after Frank  his mother had demanded it .

raw: When he came of age , Mr. Kennedy joined an Army aerial branch and excelled as a mechanic , though he never made it into combat .
replaced: When Frank came of age , Frank joined an Army aerial branch and excelled as a mechanic , though Frank never made an Army aerial branch into combat .

raw: By the time the Korean War broke out , he had re - enlisted and chose one of the most dangerous combat assignments possible , finding the coordinates for enemy targets from close range on the ground or in the air .
replaced: By the time the Korean War broke out , Frank had re - enlisted and chose one of the most dangerous combat assignments possible , finding the coordinates for enemy targets from close range on the ground or in the air .

raw: He also flew on 154 sorties , many as an air spotter , and was shot down three times .
replaced: Frank also flew on 154 sorties , many as an air spotter , and was shot down three times .

raw: Once , after crash - landing behind enemy lines , he leapt off a 40 - foot - high cliff to evade the enemy and made it back to camp , six miles away , with a broken foot , his son Tim said .
replaced: Once , after crash - landing behind enemy lines , Frank leapt off a 40 - foot - high cliff to evade the enemy and made a 40 - foot - high cliff back to camp , six miles away , with a broken foot , Frank son Tim said .

raw: Mr. Kennedy is also survived by 11 other children ( one son died before him , as did his wife ) , 38 grandchildren , 38 great - grandchildren and a great - great - grandchild , his family said .
replaced: Frank is also survived by 11 other children ( one son died before Frank , as did Frank wife ) , 38 grandchildren , 38 great - grandchildren and a great - great - grandchild , Frank family said .

raw: Mr. Kennedy was proud of his service , and of all the medals , but he felt compelled to make up for his role in the war by leaving a positive mark on the world through his inventions , his daughter in - law Lynn Kennedy said .
replaced: Frank was proud of Frank service , and of all the medals , but Frank felt compelled to make up for Frank role in the Korean War by leaving a positive mark on the world through Frank inventions , Frank daughter in - law Lynn Kennedy said .

raw: His son Thom recalled : “ He believed he would never be able to get into heaven because of all the deaths he caused by calling in artillery strikes .
replaced: Frank  I recalled : “ I believed I would never be able to get into heaven because of that  I caused by calling in artillery strikes .

raw: I ’d say , ‘ Dad , think of how many lives you saved . ’
replaced: I ’d say , ‘ Dad , think of how many lives Dad saved . ’

raw: But to his last days he carried that with him . ”
